title: Lui, South Sudan
text:
Lui is a town located in East Mundri County, <a href="Western%20Equatoria">Western Equatoria</a> State, Sudán do Sur (<a href="South%20Sudan">South Sudan</a>). Other nearby towns include Mundri, Amadi, Kediba, Lakamadi and Mideh.
The town is the headquarters of the Anglican Diocese of Lui, which originated as a <a href="Church%20Missionary%20Society">Church Missionary Society</a> Station in 1920. The diocese covers a mainly rural area of approximately 12,950 km (5,000 square miles) located just north of the equator. Central to the Diocese is the Fraser Memorial Cathedral along with a nearby Diocesan office.
